name: Color Mandala: Pixel Art Fun
description:
Do you like to solve mandala coloring puzzles? You have come to the right place. We have tons of mandala pixel art, and new art is added daily so that you won't be bored.

How does it work?
- Choose category;
- Choose pixel art image you like;
- Color your image by numbers;
- Share the time-lapse video with your friends;

Why choose our app among others?
- No subscription needed, all art is free;
- Biggest mandala 8bit collection;
- Endless fun!

Creating impressive mandala images is easy, everyone can do it. Color all the boxes by numbers provided in the palette. Hooray!
